availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jessamine County, Kentucky, farmer. Jessamine County native. Son of James Blakemon and Frances Blakemon. Married to Malinda Ray Blakemon in Garrard County on March 6, 1861. Farmer in Jessamine County in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jessamine County, p. 27A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Garrard County Marriages, film #000183256.
Find A Grave, "William C. Blakeman (June 17, 1837-April 21, 1897)," Memorial #73568104, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/73568104 (accessed May 16, 2018).
